title: HTML Component
description: A template that generates a reuseable animated component implemented as a native HTML web component.

parameters.label: Output Folder
parameters.description: Folder name for export, relative to main export folder

parameters.label: Generate UI
parameters.description: Whether to generate a UI to control playback of the timeline.

parameters.label: Hostable
parameters.description: Determines if the output of this template is meant to be hosted on FlowServices.

parameters.label: Base resource url
parameters.description: Indicates the base url path for the root directory on the remote server where templates are uploaded.
